channel.title: [PI] Force chat randomized from a string. FIGURED OUT!

item.title: [PI] Force chat randomized from a string. FIGURED OUT!
item.dc:creator: @matiasmunk matiasmunk
item.description:
@matiasmunk wrote:

[s]Hello, I’m trying to make my own kind of minigame.
I want the player to be forced to say a random string from an array.
How do I do this?

I tried to do this

if (playerCommand.startsWith("test")){
           string[] arrayOfTest ={"test", "test2", "test3", "test4", "test5"};
           c.forcedChat("Text " + arrayOfTest[Misc.random(arrayOfTest.length)] + "!");
}

But it doesn’t work… Any help?[/s]

Figured it out

Read full topic
item.source: [PI] Force chat randomized from a string. FIGURED OUT!
